re_route_every_ticks.description: Check for a new route every x times after the car starts

max_speed_and_length_factor.description: How much the length/speed influences the routing

freshness_cut_off_value.description: If data is older than this, it is not considered in the algorithm

freshness_update_factor.description: How much the freshnessUpdateFactor influences the routing

total_car_counter.description: The total amount of cars that should be in the system

exploration_percentage.description: The percentage of routes we want to use for exploration

route_random_sigma.description: The randomization sigma of edge weights

average_edge_duration_factor.description: How much the averageEdgeDurationFactor influences the routing

total_complaints.description: The total of all trip complaints

routing_duration.description: The time it takes for routing
